ygData.subject: Re: Weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: They have the same damage as regular (non-rusty) store bought weapons, but usually have a delay that is 1 or 2 faster. Best is very subjective, but if you want
ygData.messageBody:
They have the same damage as regular (non-rusty) store bought weapons, but
usually have a delay that is 1 or 2 faster. Best is very subjective, but if
you want damage you could go with a bastard sword, if you want speed you
could go with an axe or scimitar.

Bandor, Barbarian Warrior








ZWANENJ@... on 05/14/99 11:29:11 AM

Please respond to warriors_eq@onelist.com








To: warriors_eq@onelist.com

cc: (bcc: Terry Chlebek/DPT)



Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Weapons









From: "Zwanenburg, John" <ZWANENJ@...>

What are the stats on combines? Like what would you say is the best combine
1h slashing?
